item.title: META
item.description: score:-20 Chances: Meta Platforms (META) has shown strong growth in 2023, with the potential to continue surging in the near future. The company’s innovation in AI and commitment to the metaverse could drive further expansion and revenue generation. Strong short interest in Trump’s public media company Truth Social suggests potential challenges for the company’s growth.

item.title: SNAP
item.description: score:-94 Chances: SNAP has unveiled a new AR ad offering, which could potentially enhance brand visibility and engagement. The Zacks Style Scores can help investors in finding top-rated stocks based on their investing style. The legislation signed by Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis could lead to increased user engagement for social media platforms due to the new restrictions for minors.
